Text: Great movie and great upload thank u bobnjeff-lonewolf
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Subtitle_%28captioning%29 so are the sdh subs with this film an option we can turn off if we dont need them ? please explain when we see them

Thx for the effort...much appreciated
I for one am not impressed the quality of the Bluray mastering on this movie. For a *young* 16 year old release there is far too much graining in the video. Too many light to white passages reveal excessive grainy images that really should not be there at all. Too bad...I really like this movie a lot.
